resources.string: This application is created by Eugene, Felicia and Tran from Republic Polytechnic. \n\nMuseum Partner is used as a guide, helping to enhance the user experience during your museum visits.

Quick Guide
 1. In Dashboard main menu press Scan button
 2. Scan QR Code which can be found near the Museum Exhibit
 3. Wait For data being retrieved, and Done!!!
 This page will be your Exhibit Explorer


Different ways to Retrieve Data
 - Scan QR Code
 - Load from Bookmark
 - Load from Visited Exhibit
 For Advance user: You can set your Server in the Dashboard Option


Manage Audio Setting
 1. In Exhibit Explorer, Press Option button
 2. Select Playlist to see the available playable audio from the exhibit
 3. Select MediaController to display the Audio Controller for 3 second
 4. Select Setting, and configure based on your preference
